# Blast to nrDB.

```{bash}
diamond blastp --db /home/DB/DIAMOND/NCBI-NR/NCBI-NR.dmnd --query 0118A1023.contigs.fa.orf.faa --out 0118A1023.contigs.fa.orf_results.tsv --threads 20 --outfmt 6  qtitle stitle pident length qstart qend sstart send evalue bitscore --header
```

# InterproScan

```{bash}
sed  "s/\*//g" 0118A1023.contigs.fa.orf.faa > 0118A1023.contigs.fa.orf_interpro.faa
/home/kathrynappler/scripts/my_interproscan/interproscan-5.52-86.0/interproscan.sh -cpu 20 -goterms -pa -i  0118A1023.contigs.fa.orf_interpro.faa > Log_Interpro_Scan_$i.txt
```
